```{r setup, echo=FALSE, collapse=TRUE, include=FALSE}

library(flextable)
library(purrr)
library(dplyr)


FitFlextableToPage <- function(ft, pgwidth = 6){
  ft_out <- ft %>% autofit()
  ft_out <- width(ft_out, width = dim(ft_out)$widths*pgwidth /(flextable_dim(ft_out)$widths))
  return(ft_out)
}

t1 =  head(iris,20)


```
